casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy McNEILL. No. 615A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 6, 2005. John Watters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of June 2005 by Defendant Motion for leave to file a supplemental brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of June 2005."
